Package production.intermittent.PetrolGenerator

Class PetrolGenerator

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
production.intermittent.PetrolGenerator.PetrolGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, PetrolGeneratorExternalControlI, PetrolGeneratorInternalControlI
public class PetrolGenerator extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent implements PetrolGeneratorExternalControlI, PetrolGeneratorInternalControlI
TODO Voir si UserI necessaire ? The class PetrolGenerator is a petrol generator component.

Small size petrol generator, 2kW/h.

White-box Invariant

 invariant      currentPowerLevelProduction >= 0.0 && currentPowerLevelProduction <= MAX_POWER_LEVEL_PRODUCTION

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-10-15

Author:
Daniel SIMA
